title: What happened to the friends list?
body: Why is it back to this? It was normal a few minutes ago then someone asked me what was up so I restarted my client and found this.

replies.body: Repairing your client should fix this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Huggeyface,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yONJu3ax,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-06T01:16:23.706+0000)
>
> Repairing your client should fix this issue.

You can't repair your client anymore and it was just something Riot did with the Facebook feature.

I'm glad you found out what was causing the issue.
Also, you can still repair your client. It's the question mark to the right of the launch button when you first start up League.
Given this your in the facebook feature tab, and the friend tab is too high to appear, make your client a larger size.
The post-game chat has also been changed.
